content: toad clown hat & collar this pattern was written by me mage wood whimsies who hopes that you enjoy making it as much as i enjoyed designing it © maggie l wood © mage wood whimsies 1 stitches used & abbreviations k knit p purl st s stitch es slip_stitch slip_stitch yo yarn over k2tog knit 2 stitches together single knit decrease materials used needles 2 25 mm straight needles us size 1 2 mm double-point needles us size 0 yarns yarns i used aunt lydia s classic 10 crochet thread in white and black for the hat and the collar and arcane fibre works in victorian petal in fingering weight for the hat s pom-pom extras tiny bit of stuffing small piece of cardboard glue yarn needle © maggie l wood © mage wood whimsies 2 clown hat the clown hat involves stranded knitting where we knit with two colours black and white and carry the unused yarn along the back begin with white and cast on 24 stitches arrange the 24 stitches on to 3 of the 2 mm double point needles to knit in the round as
